data.eml:eml: An annotated checklist of scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) of Portugal, including Madeira and Azores Archipelagos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Franco, José Carlos, Russo, Agatino, Marotta, Salvatore (2011): An annotated checklist of scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) of Portugal, including Madeira and Azores Archipelagos. Zootaxa 3004: 1-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203405
